title: Taitara
titleTooltip: He ingoa poto, whakaahuatanga mō te kōrero
uploadArtefactButtonTooltip: Ngā pāpāho whaipānga ki te kōrero he pikitia, he tuhinga, he ataata, he kōnae whakarongo rānei ka taea
locationTooltip: He whakamārama poto mō te tauwāhi te wāhi rānei e hono ana ki te kōrero
mentionTooltip: Te hunga, te hapori hoki e kōrerotia ana e hono rānei ki te pūrākau
descriptionTooltip: He whakaaturanga hōhonu mō te kōrero
contributorTooltip: He tangata, ngā tāngata rānei i tākoha atu ki te tuhinga o te pūrākau ki te pūranga
relatedRecordsTooltip: He hononga i waenganui i ngā kōrero e rua hei ārahi i ngā kaipānui mai i tētahi kōrero ki tētahi kōrero
collectionPlaceholder: Tāpirihia te kōrero ki te kohinga
contributorNotesTooltip: He horopaki tāpiri mō te kōrero pakiwaitara rānei
formatTooltip: Te āhua a-tinana, a-tihi rānei o te pakiwaitara, o ngā taonga rawe rānei
identifierTooltip: He ahurei, tino kore kōrero mō te kōrero
sourceTooltip: Ko Te Ahunga, he hononga ki te rauemi ki te wānanga rānei, i te orokohanga mai i te pūrākau
languageTooltip: Te reo kua horaina mai mō ngā kōrero, mō ngā rawa pāpāho
transcriptionTooltip: He tauwāhi pātuhi. Kia tuku whakamāoritanga / whakapākehātanga mō te rongorongo, te ataata, te pātuhi ki ngā pikitia, mauhanga rānei
access: E āhei ana koe me tō kotahi te uru atu ki tēnei mauhanga
